title: Netanyahu Discusses AI in Private Meeting With Tech Investors
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu met with US tech executives and investors in New York on Sunday to discuss the prospects for using artificial intelligence to boost his country’s economy and military capabilities, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Netanyahu Engages with US Tech Investors on AI Revolution
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu recently met with US tech investors in a private discussion focused on artificial intelligence, aiming to leverage AI's potential for Israel's tech landscape, according to Bloomberg News.

title: How AI meets the Goddess in Kolkata
description: A former bureaucrat’s fascination with art created by artificial intelligence has turned a Durga Puja pandal into an art gallery with glowing canvases.
content: Kolkata’s Durga Puja, now proudly recognised as a UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage, has added an unexpected and dazzling new dimension this year. At Falguni Sangha in Ballygunge, the traditional pandal has been transformed into a European-style ar... [3573 chars]

title: Agentic AI and the Future of Modern BPO Call Centers
description: Walk into a business process outsourcing (BPO) call center today and something feels different. The chatter of human voices is still there, but behind that noise, another kind of intelligence is running the show.  Agentic AI, an advanced form of artificial intelligence, now works alongside people, making decisions, managing workflows, and handling tasks that once […]

title: OpenAI to bring parental controls in ChatGPT after California teen's suicide
description: (Reuters) -OpenAI is rolling out parental controls for ChatGPT on the web and mobile, following a lawsuit by the parents of a teen who died by suicide after the artificial intelligence startup's chatbot allegedly coached him on methods of self-harm.

title: Trump's team keeps posting AI portraits of him. We keep clicking
